title: I want 50% discount on vayne

embed.description: AFAIK the blue essence cost for champions always stay the same, and the half off sales only apply to RP prices. Pretty odd to see Sejuani, who is...

body:
https://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/7rc81w/psa_sejuani_on_sale_for_2400_be_on_na_server/

we need this for oce please

Sorry about this, got trolled by a friend, was so upset when he told me its not available, but i got back and checked it is there..1!!!! i am so happy

replies.body:
It is. 
It's one of the featured panels in the shop.
